channel.title: Taylor Brown
channel.description: Taylor Brown is an SEO Specialist for Tribune Publishing. He's also an improviser and makes independent comedy videos for the internet.

item.title: Burglary
item.description:
A burglar encounters an old friend while robbing an apartment. They catch up while trying not to disturb anyone who might be home.

Executive Producer: Yadhira Arroyo Assoc. Producer: Ben LeMenager

Directed by Ben LeMenager Written by Taylor Brown

Jack: Sal Mascali Tim: Taylor Brown Burglar: Jimmie Tolliver

Director of Photography: Ben LeMenager Editor: Taylor Brown Assistant Director: Jen Galler Sound Mixer: Tim Edison Makeup: Samantha Umstead

Produced by BluLight Media
